description:
Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest. But Minako is now thinking of turning down the offer, as she cannot ignore her duty as a Sailor Guardian.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol
夢一直線! アイドル美奈子誕生!?
